game_description: EON-XR is EON Reality’s flagship product, providing a mixed reality experience for users to learn, train, and perform better through modern immersive technology. Through EON-XR, users can interact with and learn by utilizing 3D models and environments in an unforgettable mixed reality experience. Lessons can be played on anything from a smartphone or personal computer to the Oculus Quest headset to provide a full “hands-on” learning and training for students and employees. With over 20 years of experience in developing mixed reality solutions for major clients in both education and enterprise, EON Reality created EON-XR as a way to remove the need for coding and technological knowhow in mixed reality content creation — allowing subject matter experts such as teachers and industry trainers to make and share their own lessons without needing advanced development knowledge.
review_1: PROS: I value in this app the simplicity and visionary approach to education and even the enterprise VR market. I like the ability to change environments, see cross-sections and simple change objects that you explore. Connectivity with a web platform that allows me to publish my content and see it here is great. Multiple formats of interaction and immersion via Video, Audio. CONS: The creation feature in the PC / Mobile version is something that I would like to see here. I look forward also to seeing it being a multi-user - this will be really something, I know that the team is working on it and it works great on other devices but being fully immersed in education experience would be something. Summary: Amazing app with massive potential. Provide tremendous possibilities with own created content. I do recommend giving it a try and also creating your own content.
review_2: If you like to learn train or create new Virtual reality experiences for education this is the app for you. Tried it this weekend and was very impressed with the ease of use and capabilities especially the 3-D recording 3-D assessment and multiuser Virtual reality and mix reality meetings.
review_3: I like the experience exploring the blue mosque and hospital room, i hope there will me more content for VR Environments in the future updates
review_4: Blown away of how this app changes the way I learn
